captions.text: Actually, I think I have to go now!
Ooooh, hold it, wow! I think that's your regular everyday meal of a thousand sacrificed souls being prepared -
Better go and check on it!

N-nothing my Lord, nothing at all! 
*nervous laughter*
I'll just go now!
What the-!?
How did you do that?
*nervousness intensifies*
WHY ARE THERE SO MANY WARP STORMS!?
But, my Lord...
The Inquisition's work has saved mankind on numerous occasions.
Like during the Hive Fleet Leviathan crisis when the Inquisitor known as Kryptman stepped forward.
The Tyranids, which he had previously named them -
-had managed to outmaneuver the Imperium but thanks to Kryptman that threat was abolished!
He had managed to have a Magos concoct a poison against the Tyranids -
-which they then managed to defeat them entirely with!
Euuuh... right, it's kinda nasty, but still!
It was quite heroic of him!
Emmmm... well.
Let's just say he didn't have the luxury to count the cost.
Anyway, there was also one time during the First War of Armageddon where the Grey Knights helped the Space Wolves fight off a Daemon Primarch!
... please don't get oversensitive about the Primarch-thing -
-I really don't need more of this...
Yes but truly the Space Wolves recieved great aid from the Grey Knights in that battle.
What do you mean?
Uh... well. *nervous laughter*
The Space Wolves kinda wanted to save the survivors of the war but the Inquisition sorta wanted to put them into labour camps and sterilize them and -
-have them die off which the um...
Space Wolves didn't really like that much so...
Well there was a cold war and the Grey Knights betrayed the Space Wolves and some shit happened -
BUT THAT ISN'T IMPORTANT! *nervous laughter everywhere*
Because, well, one time the Grey Knights stopped a Bloodthirster using an ancient, very dangerous technology known as the Bloodtide from destroying a world -
-and it was truly GLORIOUS!
Aw shit, uuum.. they killed a massive amount of innocent Sisters of Battle and anointed their armour with their blood... BUT-
Yes, I shall go ahead and do that immedietly, my Lord; I'll be back when I'm finished!
Lord Inquisitor Fyodor Karamazov...
What it is? Do not waste my time.
I'm very busy initiating exterminatus on this mining world for not giving me the shiny shit we need.
Seriously, we can't have our soldiers walking around without the bling!
A very important message has been sent to you directly from Holy Terra itself.
What is it about?
Here, read it...
WHAT!?
THIS IS HERESY!

title: If the Emperor had a Text-to-Speech Device - Episode 4: The Inquisition
